name: Garden (Murray Campbell)
description:
Garden 前栽

a meditative gardening experience

tend to your garden

use the rake to make patterns in the sand and clear plants

plant the seed and water it with the bucket and the fountain to give life

sit on the cushion to change perspective

observe

controls

w / s / q / e – up / down / left / right

a / d – turn

left click – interact

right click – throw
